Comment: By Andrew Stanton , Sonam Sheth and Gabe Whisnant - Weekend Staff Writer:   President Donald Trump reacted Thursday after the Vatican announced the selection of a new pope. Comment: I spent most of the hour between the smoke and the appearance scanning the crowd for a MAGA hat and did not see ONE! LOL!!! Oh, that will eat at his highness, for sure!  But US news had to play that clip of the choo choo train of obese obnoxious US supporters screaming, "USA USA!" So utterly embarrassing.  And a bystander pointed out he is not the first "American" pope, because Francis came from South America.  The US is literally "The United States of (the Americas)"  So to be accurate, the news should be reporting that he is the first Pope "born in the United States".   One positive thing for me, it makes renaming the Gulf a bit easier to swallow, if they would just add an "S" :  "The Gulf of the Americas"
Author: Individual-Guest-123
